name: artizone
tag_list: e-commerce, online-shopping, online-stores, retail, social-shopping, plm
overview: Artizone develops the next generation online shopping solution, focusing it’s efforts on small, local businesses and artisans“ the backbone of the community’s retail life. To do that, artizone develops an innovative solution that includes both the online retail channel, and the connectivity to the physical world, where commerce actually happens. We are passionate about the serving our customers“ the consumers and the business-owners, and we are passionate about leading the e-commerce world to it’s next phase, where online world and physical world are one. We have a team of exceptionally talented professional, all driven by the passion of inventing new ways to provide a top-quality service. Artizone is also engaged in a services contract with a 2nd large european software company - Dassaultâ€“Systemes. Through this contract we support their SMB solution that is being used by ~10,000 customers around the world.
